original: Lindberg, Karl Arthur, postmästare, Mellerud, f. 5/2/90 i Skellefteå av grossh. Karl Johan L. o. Victoria Rid-derstråhle. G. m. Hulda Nickksson. Barn: Gösta f. 10, Anna-Stina o. Anna-Greta ff. 18. — Realex. i Umeå 07. Res:postexp. i norra distr. 11, e. postexp. s. å., v. järnv:posten i norra distr. 15, postexp. där 16, i Jörn s. å., postas^sist. där 25, förste po’stassist. i Kiruna 35, postmäst. i Mellerud fr. 41. GMnr.
translated: Lindberg, Karl Arthur, postmaster, Mellerud, b. 5/2/90 in Skellefteå to grocer Karl Johan L. and Victoria Ridderstråhle. Married to Hulda Nickksson. Children: Gösta b. 10, Anna-Stina and Anna-Greta b. 18. Completed secondary school in Umeå in 1907. Started working as a postal examiner in the northern district in 1911, became a postal examiner in the same year, worked with the railway mail in the northern district in 1915, became a postal examiner there in 1916, moved to Jörn in the same year, served as a postal supervisor there in 1925, promoted to first postal assistant in Kiruna in 1935, appointed postmaster in Mellerud from 1941.
